x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: By helping people choose the greenest possible route, balancing travel time, CO₂ emissions, and crowd data, GreenRoutes could reduce daily urban carbon output by measurable percentages and encourage public transport use.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Urban commuters often default to private cars due to inefficient public transport routes or lack of visibility into eco-friendly alternatives. This leads to congestion and high carbon emissions.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: GreenRoutes – AI-Driven Public Transport & Walking Optimizer
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The following applications will be used to power our solution;

  • ServiceNow App Engine for route suggestion workflows
  • IntegrationHub Spokes to connect to live transport APIs (e.g., Google Transit, City Bus, Train networks)

  • Now Experience UI for an interactive commuter dashboard
  • Flow Designer + Predictive Intelligence to analyze historic route data and recommend greener options
  • Performance Analytics to show personal and community carbon savings over time

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

We would be Integrating APIs for public transit data and city mobility datasets (open data APIs) also Map rendering or GIS plugin 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Access to accurate real-time data from multiple transport providers and Encouraging adoption and behavioral change among commuters, also network connections are spotty.
